2 Peter F. Brown , Stephen A. Della Pietra , Vincent J. Della Pietra , Meredith J. Goldsmith , Jan Hajic , Robert L. 8 Ingrid Meyer. 2001. Extracting knowledge-rich contexts for terminography. In in (Bourigault et al., 2001), pages 279--302.
